Sentencas: Nanopowdered solid solution Ce1-xY(Nd)(x)O2-delta samples ( 0.1 <= x <= 0.25) were made by self-propagating room temperature (SPRT) synthesis.
Titulo: Ce1-xY(Nd)xO2-δ nanopowders:: potential materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The first-order Raman spectra of Ce1-xY(Nd)(x)O2-delta samples measured at room temperature exhibit three broad features: the main Raman active F-2g mode at about 450 cm(-1) and two broad features at about 550 (545) and 600 cm-1.
Titulo: Ce1-xY(Nd)xO2-δ nanopowders:: potential materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The mode at similar to 600 cm(-1) was assigned to the intrinsic oxygen vacancies due to the nonstoichiometry of ceria nanopowders.
Titulo: Ce1-xY(Nd)xO2-δ nanopowders:: potential materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The mode at about 550 (545) cm(-1) was attributed to the oxygen vacancies introduced into the ceria lattice whenever Ce4+ ions are replaced with trivalent cations (Y3+, Nd3+).
Titulo: Ce1-xY(Nd)xO2-δ nanopowders:: potential materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The intensity of this mode increases with doping in both series of samples, indicating a change of O2- vacancy concentration.
Titulo: Ce1-xY(Nd)xO2-δ nanopowders:: potential materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The mode frequency shifts in opposite direction in Y- and Nd-doped samples with doping level, suggesting that different types of defect space can occur in Y- and Nd-doped ceria nanopowders.
Titulo: Ce1-xY(Nd)xO2-δ nanopowders:: potential materials for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
